goal.en: 1. Improve students’ understanding of the Enlightenment Movement; 2. Discuss the role of Jean-Jacques Rousseau in the Enlightenment Movement; 3. Analyze Rousseau’s position in modern political philosophy.
goal.ch: 1. 增進學生對於啟蒙哲學的了解 2. 講授盧梭在啟蒙運動中的角色與作用 3. 分析盧梭在近代政治哲學中的地位

content.en:
This course will present Rousseau’s two oeuvres: The Origin of Inequality and The Social Contract. These two oeuvres signify the fundamental stance of Rousseau on philosophical anthropology: The Man is innately cooperative and loving but gradually driven by desire, leading to inequality as a consequence.
In the Enlightenment Movement, with prevailing progressive voices, the seemingly nostalgic ideas of Rousseau, as opposed to the ideas of Hobbes, point out the calculous harm of Reason by repressing the natural feeling. According to Rousseau, the natural man, before the development of Reason, has “self-love” and “pity” to make themselves keep the good virtues of kindness, satisfaction, independence, and freedom. The social system, nonetheless, has degenerated the man for the pursuit of efficiency, and what followed is dependence on others, comparison with others, and the inclination towards rewards while avoiding punishment and penalties. In fact, Rousseau has no intention to propose the natural man but to infer that the most precious value of people in a political regime is freedom. The existence of the state should be the product of a free contract between the free people and the state. Once the freedom of people is deprived, they have the right to retake their own right in a revolutionary way. Hence, Rousseau considers democracy the best political model. It can be said that such an idea of Rousseau laid the foundation for the subsequent American Independence Movement and the French Revolution. It also manifests the spirit of the Enlightenment.
content.ch:
本課程將討論盧梭的兩部政治學作品，分別為《不平等的起源》以及《社會契約論》。這兩部作品標誌了盧梭的哲學人類學的基本立場：處於自然狀態的人原是互相合作，相愛相親，後來因社會制度的出現，而逐漸淪為惡的慾念所驅使，最後導致了不平等狀態的出現。
在啟蒙運動，倡議進步的風潮中，盧梭這種看似懷舊的主張，不僅與霍布斯相對立，還指出了理性的計算之害，壓抑了人的自然情感。在盧梭看來，在理性發展之前，是「自保之愛」以及「憐憫」這兩種情感使得人保有善意、滿足、獨立與自由。而社會制度中，為求效率，彼此依賴，隨之而來的分工、獎懲與比較，便使人喪失了那些德性，而愈形墮落。盧梭並非倡議人要回到原始狀態，而是要推論出：在一政體中，人民最可貴的價值在於自由，國家只能是自由的人民自由協議的產物，如果人民的自由遭到剝奪，那麼人民有權以革命的方式，奪回屬於自己的權利，因此，盧梭以為最好的政體是民主共和國。一定程度來說，盧梭的主張為隨之而來的美國獨立運動以及法國大革命奠立了立國的基礎，這也是啟蒙運動精神的彰顯。
